name: Gungrave: G.O.R.E.
summary: Gungrave GORE is a true sequel of Gungrave O.D, a cult classic game that was released 15 years ago. This epic trailer includes a story cinematic AND first-look gameplay. Gungrave GORE is a Playstation 4 exclusive title, release date TBD.
info:
• 中文名: 铳墓 GORE
  • 别名: Gungrave GORE
  • 别名: GunGrave GORE
  • 平台: PS4
  • 发行日期: 2020年
  • 官方网站: http://www.gungrave.com/
